p: In the early days of the outbreak, when cases were restricted only to China, the mean incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 was reported to be about 5 days [ 2]. The time on average for its exponential growth (and infection of other individuals) was observed to be about 7 days, while the mean interval for transmission from person to person was also about 7 days. The R 0 value was found to be between 2 and 8.
